title: Be Careful What You Joust For
description: An alternative cover edition for this ASIN can be found here and here.Twenty years ago, an assassin snuck into the castle and plunged his dagger into the king's heart. Then he vanished without a trace.A bounty was put on his head. The whole kingdom searched for him for years. But as no clues were found, people stopped looking.Except Princess Isolda.
author: Ryan Hauge
